shortDescription.default: Set you custom favicon for your SPO Site

longDescription.default: This app allows you to have your own custom favicon for your site. Using is simple, after installing it from the tenant app catalog, site thumbnail (set in settings > Change look > Header) will be set as your new favicon. If you wish to have a different picture, than the site thumbnail, upload your picture in ico format to SiteAssets library with name favicon -> 'favicon.ico'. The picture address will become something like 'https://msfintl.sharepoint.com/sites/<your site url>/SiteAssets/favicon.ico'.

features.title: MSF custom favicon
features.description: Deploys a custom action with ClientSideComponentId association
